title: Introduction to Microwave Cookery
brief_description: Virginia Hill presents a videotape that will take the mystery out of microwave cooking. Microwave cooking is easy, nutritious and fun when you know how. This tape takes the viewer through a step-by-step guide to the microwave oven and its effective use.
